channel.title: Help getting server up no-ip isn't working
channel.description:
I know this is a very very FAQ but this is what I've done. I have my server up and running on my computer, I have gotten a no-ip and it works for my computer but when I ask a friend to test it out they cannot get on. When he hits the run.bat that black box comes up for a quick second then goes away.
I've searched the forums for a post that may help me with no luck...
Anyone know what I'm doing wrong? (because I'm sure it's a no-brainer mistake that I missed)

item.title: Help getting server up no-ip isn't working
item.dc:creator: @Chicken_guy Chicken guy
item.description:
@Chicken_guy wrote:

sonicforce41:

not into client.java. copy and paste everything from run.bat into this post so i can take a look at it.

@echo off
title CLient
java -Xmx500m -cp .;./bin; EGUI

I just noticed this at the end but I guess it could have screwed the whole thing up…

@exit was at the end of the file I deleted it for now but if it was important I"ll put it back in

Read full topic
